Package br.edu.cleardrive.thread

Class FilesRecoverySubject

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • br.edu.cleardrive.thread.FilesRecoverySubject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class FilesRecoverySubject
extends java.lang.Thread
    FilesRecoverySubject is responsable to recover every file (if possible) of a drive.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Clederson Cruz
